ingredients: 2 cups flour,   +   3/4 cup white sugar, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   3/4 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/4 cup unsalted butter, cut into pieces and softened,   +   3/4 cup orange juice, 1 tablespoon grated orange zest, 1 large egg, beaten, 1 cup chopped cranberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 439mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 15mg 73%, Calcium 73mg 6%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 136mg 3%
